tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE Species (species_id INT PRIMARY KEY, species_name TEXT);    CREATE TABLE Population (population_id INT PRIMARY KEY, species_id INT, population_count INT, measurement_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES Species(species_id));    CREATE TABLE PopulationHistory (history_id INT PRIMARY KEY, population_id INT, population_count INT, measurement_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (population_id) REFERENCES Population(population_id));    CREATE TABLE Region (region_id INT PRIMARY KEY, region_name TEXT);    CREATE TABLE Habitat (habitat_id INT PRIMARY KEY, region_id INT, habitat_type TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES Region(region_id));
